topic: not available due to small sample size

Out of all respondents aged 15+ who were at risk of being discriminated by healthcare or social services personnel when accessing healthcare in the past 12 months.|The answer category "No" does also include small number of respondents, who answered "Don't know" or "Prefer not to say".
